channel.title: [pi] How to change where bandos chest and bandos tassys go. [pi]
channel.description: How do i change which armor slot it's goes into with bandos chest, and bandos tassys.

item.title: [pi] How to change where bandos chest and bandos tassys go. [pi]
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

like sticky said go into item.java and put the id in the right place.
i had trouble with some items i put them in platebody and it dint work so i moved them to body and they worked.
i have tragedy pks source so the items i had trouble with are all 3rd age tops and dplate. just put them in the body part. and on sanitys equipment editor i heard its kinda messed up like if you pick helmet it will go in the weapon slot and stuff like that.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] How to change where bandos chest and bandos tassys go. [pi]

item.title: [pi] How to change where bandos chest and bandos tassys go. [pi]
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

go into item.java and say you wanted to add a helmet which was equipting in weapn slot search for “hat”
by holding ctrl + f
then add the id under there
